comment:
Amber Heard in Aquaman.
Rumours of Amber Heard being fired from the Aquaman franchise have emerged again, but they are reportedly not true

Several reports of Amber Heard being fired from Aquaman 2 have emerged online, leading the actress to trend on social media. The reports have been debunked by The Hollywood Reporter staff writer Ryan Parker, who took to social media to state he‚Äôs been told by a ‚Äúreliable source" that the reports of Heard‚Äôs alleged firing are ‚Äúinaccurate."

Following the emergence of the reports on Sunday, Parker tweeted, ‚ÄúTold by a reliable source that reports of Amber Heard being fired off ‚ÄòAquaman 2‚Äô are inaccurate."

Told by a reliable source that reports of Amber Heard being fired off 'Aquaman 2' are inaccurate.‚Äî Ryan Parker (@TheRyanParker) February 28, 2021

Amber Heard Strongly Reacts to 'Paid Campaign' for Her Removal from Aquaman 2


Johnny Depp Wants Defamation Trial Against Amber Heard Postponed As It Clashes With 'Fantastic Beasts 3' Shoot

This is not the first time rumours of the actress being fired have spread, seemingly stemming from her public legal battle with ex-husband Johnny Depp. Both Depp and Heard have contested the other was physically and verbally abusive during their relationship.


Depp has already been fired from Warner Bros.‚Äô Fantastic Beasts franchise, which also caused some to wonder why Heard wasn‚Äôt receiving the same fate, reported 

Heard plays Xebellian princess Mera in the DCEU, ever since her first appearance in 2017‚Äôs Justice League. She went on to have a prominent role in 2018‚Äôs Aquaman and will reprise the part next month for Zack Snyder‚Äôs Justice League.

comment:
Absolutely!!! I'm disgusted that she would use the #Me Too movement for her false allegations against Johnny Depp. She needs to go through anger management and learn to "self sooth," as she told Johnny to quit running away when they start fighting. He did the right thing. Who wants to continually listen to a Narccistic person blame you for all their problems. How exhausting! There is a tape recorder on here where she tells Johnnie that if he divorced her, that she would go out and put make up on her face to make it look like he beat her up. They were only married for 15 months and when he told her he wanted a divorce, she wanted 3 of their vehicles and a penthouse suite that he owned and $10,000 a month for upkeep. Then she blamed her attorney for that. Yeah, right. If you were beaten 13 times in 15 months, I guarantee you that she would not be able to show her face in public. She is a disgusting person and it's time we start to quit supporting abusive women. Let's not make it any harder than it already is for male victims to come forward and heal.
#justiceforjohnny

comment:
PLEASE read all of this post before bringing out the pitchforks!  I know people like her are MADE, not born.  This is not to negate how she acts but to try to understand how she became this evil, vindictive, vicious person with no real friends.  What would make one of the most beautiful women in the world (even pre-plastic surgery) behave in this manner when she had so much going for her.  Amber has all of the characteristics of some-one who has suffered SEVERE, long term, terror and trauma as a very young child.  She behaves so much like my Father.   He was murdered by my 16 year old brother and any outside observer would state he richly deserved it.  After 2-3 years of councilling I said some nasty comment about him and my councillor looked at me and said: that man never had a happy day in his life.  I had an incredible, physical reaction and all of the hatred I felt for him dropped away -  I was almost hysterical.  I became angry at her and asked why the hell she hadn't told me that day #1 and she said I was not ready then!    We have since learned he was sexually and physically abused by his parents AND grandparents from a very young age.
I think Johnny could help her by dropping the case if she comes out and states the TRUTH  and apolagizes.  ( I fear she may not go thrue the necassry  work first. )  I know this is her ONLY chance to be forgiven and maybe even stay in the movie industry.  If she continues with her same path I see NOTHING but death and destruction.  I am REALLY worried about her harming JD  when she feels she has been exposed.  I think people would forgive her if she is honest and lets the world know HOW she was so damaged.  (I am looking at dear old Dad).  Unfortunatly I think  she will suffer, in JD's words "TOTAL GLOBAL HUMILIATION".
Truth  and honesty are the only thing that will save her now.
